question: Write a letter to your friend in another country where you like to visit for the holidays. In your letter, you should:Explain your travel plans.Describe the interesting places you plan to visit.Ask for suggestion for sightseeing options.
text: I hope you and your family are great. I am really excited to share the good news that I am coming to Canada for the Christmas vacation.

I would like to tell you my plan for this vacation. Firstly, I am going to New York City  to meet my relatives. In the USA I  plan to stay for five days. On 24th  ,December I will come to Canada and see you in your city Brampton. In ,Canada I would like to live 15 days as  we want to  celebrate Christmas and New year there.

Oh,another thing I wanted to tell you is that I have a plan to go to Niagara Falls. I want to stay there one night because I want to see the fireworks and the nightlife of the city which is very famous. In addition, I have already booked a room for the New year celebration at CN Tower in Toronto.
I would  greatly appreciate it if you could advise me about some  tourist places in your city. I want to do skiing. Furthermore,please recommend to me some places for Indian food in Brampton city.
Let me know if you need anything from India. I am really happy to see you after a long time.
